thread.title: Giants are the best team in the NFC East | Talk is Cheap (PODCAST)
thread.title_full: Giants are the best team in the NFC East | Talk is Cheap (PODCAST) | NJ.com

author: Jordan Raanan | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Giants are the best team in the NFC East | Talk is Cheap (PODCAST)
text:
The Giants are on a roll. And boy did they look good in Sunday's 24-10 win over the Buffalo Bills.
In this week's podcast episode, James Kratch, Joe Giglio and I talk about how the Giants are suddenly in the NFC East driver's seat, given how they've looked overall and the state of the division.
Don't forget, "Talk is Cheap" is available every Tuesday morning for your commute. Get used to that. Subscribe, download, rate it on iTunes and bring it with you on the train, in the car, to the gym or work.
Enjoy and all feedback is welcome.
